note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Facebook SDK for Python
body:
This client library is designed to support the Facebook Authentication and 
Graph API. Read more about the [Graph API](http://developers.facebook.com/docs/api)

Example of use:
```
    request  = {'signed_request':'...'}
    fb       = Facebook(request,app_id,app_secret)
    session  = fb.getSession()
    graph    = fb.getGraph()
    user     = graph.get_object("me")
    friends  = graph.get_connections(user["id"], "friends")
```

### Support or Contact
If you have some problems or propositions you can contact with me creotiv@gmail.com or post an issue to tracker.

My blog: http://creotiv.blogspot.com
